content.text: Hello! I'm John, and I live in Dallas, TX. I'm a physical therapist, and my wife is a school nurse. We have two kids, ages 14 and 12, and we also have three dogs and two cats.

Hi John! I'm James, and I live in Nashville, TN. I work in academia at a local university, and I'm committed to the environment. I like to go to the farmers market every weekend, and I play music in my spare time.
It's nice to meet you, James! I've always wanted to visit Nashville. What's it like living there?
Nashville is a great city! It's a lot of fun, and there's always something to do. There's a great music scene, and there's a lot of history here too.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'll have to come visit sometime.
You definitely should! I'd be happy to show you around.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking, biking, and camping. I also like to play video games and watch movies.
Those all sound like fun activities! I like to do some of those things too. I also like to go to concerts and art museums.
I've been to a few concerts, but I've never been to an art museum.
You should go! There are a lot of great art museums in Nashville.
I'll have to check them out next time I'm in town.
Thanks for the recommendations, James. I'm glad I met you.
You're welcome! I'm glad I met you too.
Maybe we can hang out sometime when I'm in Nashville.
That would be great! I'd love to show you around.
